summary: A brief email from August 10, 2019, reporting that Jeffrey Epstein committed suicide that morning while in custody and died en route to the hospital. The sender anticipates the Bureau of Prisons will notify his lawyers and the press.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email; reported to have committed suicide while in custody and died on the way to the hospital.

events.title: Epstein's Suicide
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein committed suicide while in custody and died on the way to the hospital.

keyFacts: His death is reported as a suicide that occurred while he was in custody.
He died en route to the hospital.
The Bureau of Prisons (BOP) is referenced as the entity expected to notify his lawyers and the press.
